titleStmt.title: Animadversions on the Lady Marquess: or, properties display'd. View here the abstract of the worlds great frame, whose worth for ever morraliz'd a name; whose noble gen'rous parts, I dare to say, will get renown, the clean contrary way. Tune of, Hey boys up go we.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Jordon, at the Angel in Guilt-Spur-street,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "The Lady Marquess and her gang,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
